name: Samsung Backup File
summary: Learn about .SBU files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: With the Data backup option selected, select the items you'd like to back up by clicking the check boxes.
Click the Backup button, after the back up is completed, click Complete.
On Windows, the SBU files will be located here:
To restore SBU files to your device:
With the Restore data option selected, select the items you'd like to restore by clicking the check boxes.
Click the Restore button, after the restore is completed, click Complete.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
